message.body: Hi again! How have you been?
I've been great. I finished my summer class, so I've just been working and relaxing, which is nice.
nice! I'm at work now.. wish I still had summers off!
I always have to take at least one summer class cause 3 months is too long for me to have nothing to do! Also, there's the fact that I won't graduate ontime if I don't.
